This file contains the list of changes for each release of geneauto2.

2.4.10 01/05/2013
Reference Title
BZ:843 Import * as matrix multiplication
BZ:842 Parenthesize binary expressions, when the generated expression tree is not in the C associativity order
BZ:841 Improved support of binary operations between vectors and vector-matrices
BZ:840 F and G blocks have been renamed to Interpolation1D and 2D respectively. Their interface has been extended to support Xcos integration and code generation has been corrected. 
BZ:839 Fixed a problem with negative constants to avoid uncompilable expressions like a--1
BZ:838 Generate correct code from matrix multiplications in nested expressions (e.g. A*B*C). Previously an error was raised or generated code was uncompilable
BZ:837 Generate HAVE_STRUCT_<structure_name> iff <structure_name> structure is defined by GeneAuto to ease integrating with external applications
BZ:386 Prefixing generated pimitive types with GA to avoid conflicts when integrating with external applications
BZ:836 Correcting file mode of Linux launcher scripts
BZ 406 Adding support for importing numeric values with negative exponent
BZ:249 Sum block: Corrected case for single scalar input and "-" sign
BZ:247 RelationalOperator block: Corrected port typing error


2.4.9+ 23/07/2012 (Snapshot)
Reference Title
BZ:457 Moved extra blocks Scope and Display into the standard library blocklibrary.gbl.xml. Removed blocklibrary-extra.gbl.xml
BZ:404 Math block: Fixed code generation for options "rem", "hypot" and "transpose". Unsupported functions (e.g. with complex domain) rejected with a clear error message.
BZ:400 Fixed error importing negative constants from Simulink models.
BZ:386 Renamed C type definition BOOL to GABOOL to avoid conflicts when integrating generated code with external applications.


2.4.9+ 28/11/2011 (Snapshot)
Reference Title
BZ:126 CPrinter: Fixed an error handling output arrays.
BZ:120 CPrinter: Fixed code generation for trigger/enable block
BZ:102 CPrinter: Fixed assignment to observation variable
BZ:101 SwitchBackend: Removed extra loop step in the generated code, when input is vector
BZ:85   CodeModelOptimizer: Optimize both branches of an if statement


2.4.9 05/10/2011
Reference Title
TN:77	CPrinter: name conflict check is not implemented for elements created in adaptation step
TN:83	geneauto2 linux binary not found
TN:46	Trigonometry block: Wrong code generated
TN:45	Implement support of true and false constants in stateflow
TN:61	Add debugging related command arguments to Gene-Auto
TN:75	Implement pass-by-value mechanism for functions with non-scalar input
TF:924	Added support for NE operator
TF:925	Fixed base index handling in ForIterator backend
TF:941	TSImulinkImporter determines model name from file name, instead the stored name
TF:942	Log files are written in two places, when -O option was supplied
TF:943	Tool initialisation erorr, when output file starts with a lowercase drive letter
TF:944	Allow overriding the default binary installation path identification
TF:946	Fixed required command line argument check
TF:949	Removed unnecessary case conversion during name normalisation
TF:950	Fixed library location problem in AdaPrinter
TF:110811_1	Incorrect data type for loop variables
TF:110901_3	Long line importing problem in Stateflow importer
TF:110901_4	Inefficient Mux/Demux code generation (out of memory with large arrays)


2.4.8 13/12/2010
Reference	Title	
    Version Submitted by	Date submitted	Severity	Datatype	Assigned to
TF:560	Remove varPortIdMatches and store reference to a variable corresponding to port in the port object	
		2.4.1	Castel	2009/01/30	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:850	Add attribute isVirtual to CompoundStatement	
		2.4.6	Naks	2010/07/01	NICE TO HAVE	FEATURE REQUEST	Andrei Rybinski
TF:854	TAdaPrinter: Shift left and shift right operators are not implemented	
		2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/06	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:855	TAdaPrinter: wrong printing of non-scalar UnaryExpressions	
		2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/06	MINOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski
TF:856	TAdaPrinter: null pointer exception in gac_18.gac_18_sp3Test	
		2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/06	MINOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski
TF:858	Code refactoring: rename method replaceExpression to replaceMe and change signature of argument to Object	
		2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/09	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:860	After introducing the method GASysInfo.getDefSrcLibraryPath() the ada printer does not find the library path	
		2.4.7 dev	Naks	2010/07/13	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski
TF:861	Models with model reference block fail in fmpreprocessor with message "... block ... does not have Port parameter" (see also TF:863)	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/07/16	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Tonu Naks
TF:863	Simulink does not set PortNumber parameter for the rist port in subsystem	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/07/16	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Tonu Naks
TF:864	TAdaPrinter: compilation of gacommon file fails	
		2.4.7 dev	Robinski	2010/07/16	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:865	Add semantic information about the transformations to the intermediate model file names	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/07/16		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:866	Inline all subsystems except function call targets, enabled subsystems and  stateflow charts	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/07/26	MAJOR	FEATURE REQUEST	Andrei Rybinski
TF:867	Read isObservable flag from the mdl file	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/07/26	MAJOR	FEATURE REQUEST	Andrei Rybinski
TF:869	Implement "treat as atomic unit" for inlined subsystems 	
		2.4.6	Naks	2010/07/30	MAJOR	FEATURE REQUEST	Andres Toom
TF:870	Add error message to expression's replaceMe method	
		2.4.6	Robinski	2010/08/02	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:871	Quote filenames containing spaces when launching elementary tools	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/08/02		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:873	Generate global variable for each signal with flag isObservable  (depends on TF:868)	
		2.4.6	Naks	2010/08/25	MAJOR	FEATURE REQUEST	Tonu Naks
TF:875	AdaPrinter must allow initialisation of arrays with scalar values (the code model allows scalar expansion)	
		2.4.6	Naks	2010/08/26	BLOCKING	FEATURE REQUEST	Andrei Rybinski
TF:876	When merge block input is global and output local, the gloabal variable is removed after processign the merge block	
		2.4.7 dev	Naks	2010/08/27	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:877	AdaPrinter: Two consecutive underscores in the variable name 	
		2.4.7 dev	Naks	2010/08/29	BLOCKING	BUG REPORT	Tonu Naks
TF:879	Improve name collision handling in TPrinter to avoid also possible hiding of names in subscopes	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/09/02		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:880	ArgumentReader: Add support of multiple unvalued configuration switches	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/09/02			
TF:881	Negative Real values are pritned without the sign	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/09/02	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Tonu Naks
TF:882	Array Data types of variable and its initial value do not match	
		2.4.7	Robinski	2010/09/06	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:883	Initial Value of TCustom type variable is evaluated incorrectly	
		2.4.7	Robinski	2010/09/06	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:884	ClassCastException in TCPrinter	
		2.4.7	Robinski	2010/09/07	MINOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski
TF:885	Ensure that module names do not conflict with reserved words in target language	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/09/07		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:886	TAdaPrinter: compilation error because of variable's name that starts wth number	
		2.4.7	Robinski	2010/09/07	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:888	Printer: NamesNormalizer several subsequent whitespace and/or underscores shall be replaced with single underline	
		2.4.7	Robinski	2010/09/20	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski
TF:890	Generate START and END annotations around the code section from a block	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/09/28		FEATURE REQUEST	Andrei Rybinski
TF:893	Blocks with continuous sample time cause the rate translation buffer to be activated	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/10/07	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Tonu Naks
TF:896	Inlining does not connect the inputs of the inlined subsystem correctly	
		2.4.7 dev	Naks	2010/10/07	BLOCKING	BUG REPORT	Andres Toom
TF:899	Move only Exported variables to the parameters' module	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/10/22		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:900	StateModel generation: Remove obsolete NamedConstant from the CodeModel before TPrinter	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/10/22		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:901	TSimulinkImporter: Constant definition importer does not stop on error	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/10/29		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:902	UserDefinedFunction block: Incorrect handling of scalar OUT arguments	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/11/03		BUG REPORT	Andres Toom
TF:904	UserDefinedFunction block: Unable to parse long function names	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/11/04		BUG REPORT	Andres Toom
TF:905	UserDefinedFunction block: Size 1 array not supported in scalar input	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/11/08		FEATURE REQUEST	Andres Toom
TF:908	UserDefinedfunction block: Support string type in Legacy Function prototype	
		2.4.7	Toom	2010/11/10		FEATURE REQUEST	Andres Toom
TF:913	The optimiser assumes that a function call does not have a side effect	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/11/12	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Andres Toom
TF:914	TFMCodeModelGenerator: Error in inlining mode	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/11/28		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:915	TFMCodeModelGenerator: Replace BlockVarName map with a map of elements	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/11/29		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:916	TFMCodeModelGenerator: Replace usage of the 'signals' collection with maps	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/11/29		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:918	Integer division is generated for division of constants	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/12/12		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:920	TFMPreProcessor: Observation points on virtual subsystem io-signals are not preserved	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/12/12		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:921	TCodeModelOptimiser: Optimiser removes an observable variable	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/12/12		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:922	TPrinter: Misplacement of END annotations in non-scalar expansion	
		2.4.7 dev	Toom	2010/12/13		DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andres Toom
TF:923	DataStoreMemory backend fails because of missing InitialValue parameter 	
		2.4.7	Naks	2010/12/13	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Tonu Naks

		2.4..7 dev	Toom	2010/11/10		FEATURE REQUEST	Andres Toom


2.4.7 (DEV SNAPSHOT) 08/11/2010
----------------

Reference	Title	
    Version	Submitted by	Date submitted	Severity	Datatype	Assigned to

        2.4.1	Castel	2009/01/30	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski

        2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/06	MINOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski

        2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/06	MINOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski
TF:858	Code refactoring: rename method replaceExpression to replaceMe and change signature of argument to Object	
        2.4.6	Robinski	2010/07/09	MINOR	DEVELOPMENT TASK	Andrei Rybinski

        2.4.7 dev	Naks	2010/07/13	MAJOR	BUG REPORT	Andrei Rybinski
